mapper.update: update transaction set status=1 where t_id=#{tid}
update transaction set status=2 where t_id=#{tid}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE(begin_time) AS date, sum(spend) as spend FROM transaction WHERE MONTH(begin_time) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) AND YEAR(begin_time) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY DATE(begin_time) ORDER BY date;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(begin_time, '%Y-%m') AS date, SUM(spend) AS spend FROM transaction WHERE begin_time >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 2 MONTH) AND begin_time < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(begin_time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY date;

SELECT sector, SUM(spend) AS spend FROM transaction WHERE begin_time >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 2 MONTH) AND begin_time < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY sector;
